text: 2018 was a rough year for Philadelphia's reformed phenom Meek Mill. However, everyone loves a great comeback story. Early Friday morning ( Nov. 30 ), he blessed the hip - hop world with his fourth studio album, Championships. After being released from prison this past spring, the ` ` Wins & Losses'' emcee became a prominent advocate for criminal reform and kept fans on the edge of their seats, beaming with anticipation, over the rumored features and the album's content. The album features budding R & B songstress, Ella Mai, Future, foe - turned - friend, Drake, and even the GOAT himself, Jay - Z, who had a word or two about Kanye West. It also features a banger, ` ` On Me,''
